settings.title: High Quality
settings.caption: Our long-staple organic cotton has been cultivated since antiquity. It is tightly woven, incredibly durable, and is free from genetic modification and the use of pesticides.

settings.title: Better for Skin
settings.caption: Skin wasn't meant to be in contact with harsh chemicals. True organically grown cotton is free from the carcinogenic chemicals sprayed on and embedded in conventionally grown cotton.

settings.title: Environmentally Friendly
settings.caption: Unlike polyester fabrics, cotton does not shed microplastics. By using organic cotton we are also contributing to much healthier soil. It takes nearly a third of a pound of chemical fertilizers to produce just one cotton shirt!
